text: Charlie Francis is a Scottish film director who is possibly best known for his directorial work on the short film Middle Man The film was awarded Best British Short at the Iris Film Festival which included a sponsored prize from Pinewood Studios.Iris Film Festival WinnersJill Buchanan, "Falkirk scriptwriter wins Iris Prize at Welsh ‘Oscars’", Falkirk Herald, 23 October 2014 On 19 March 2015, it was announced by BAFTA Scotland that the film was nominated for the Best Entertainment accolade at the 2015 British Academy Scotland New Talent Awards.BAFTA Scotland 2015 Winners & Nominees ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="margin-right: 0;" |- !
